mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_ratings (user_id, book_id, rating, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{rating}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT #{bookId} AS bookId, COALESCE(AVG(rating), 0.0) AS averageRating, COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) AS totalRatings, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 5.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating50Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 4.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating45Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 4.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating40Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 3.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating35Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 3.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating30Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating25Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 2.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating20Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating15Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 1.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating10Count, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN rating = 0.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS rating05Count FROM book_ratings WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND rating IS NOT NULL
